mapper.select: select nvl(username,'입력정보없음') as userName,nvl(mname,'입력정보없음') as mName,nvl(mtel,'입력정보없음') as mTel,nvl(maddr,'입력정보없음') as addr,nvl(TO_CHAR(mbirth, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"'),'입력정보없음') as mBirth ,nvl(memail,'입력정보없음') as mEmail from users where delyn='N'

select nvl(username,'입력정보없음') as userName,nvl(mname,'입력정보없음') as mName,nvl(mtel,'입력정보없음') as mTel,nvl(maddr,'입력정보없음') as addr,nvl(TO_CHAR(mbirth, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"'),'입력정보없음') as mBirth ,nvl(memail,'입력정보없음') as mEmail from users where username like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or mname like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and delyn='N'

select nvl(u.username,'입력정보없음') as userName,nvl(u.mname,'입력정보없음') as mName, nvl(u.mtel,'입력정보없음') as mTel,nvl(u.maddr,'입력정보없음') as addr, nvl(TO_CHAR(u.mbirth,'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"'),'입력정보없음') as mBirth , nvl(u.memail,'입력정보없음') as mEmail from users u , authorities a where u.username = a.username and a.authority='ROLE_MARKET' and u.delyn='N'

select nvl(u.username,'입력정보없음') as userName,nvl(u.mname,'입력정보없음') as mName, nvl(u.mtel,'입력정보없음') as mTel,nvl(u.maddr,'입력정보없음') as addr, nvl(TO_CHAR(u.mbirth,'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"'),'입력정보없음') as mBirth , nvl(u.memail,'입력정보없음') as mEmail from users u , authorities a where u.username = a.username and a.authority='ROLE_USER' and u.delyn='N'
select authority from authorities where username = #{userName}
select u.*,m.mkname from users u,market m where u.username=#{userName} and u.username=m.username
select u.*,s.sname from users u,store s where u.username=#{userName} and u.username=s.username
